key1.name: Fob
key1.description: You sense that this key is the starting point to a great challenge.

key2.name: HangarHint
key2.description: You notice a message on the computer monitor: 'Hey, did you lock me in the hangar again? Good thing I keep a spare key here.' The message must be referring to the hangar entrance door.

key3.name: Blaster
key3.description: Standard issue laser blaster. Point towards the enemy.

key4.name: Explosive
key4.description: This is a powerful explosive device. It can destroy several rooms, but placed in critical areas, it can take out larger structures.

key5.name: Teleport
key5.description: The teleporter is a one-time use item, it will take your character back to the starting hangar bay.

key6.name: Injection
key6.description: The Bacta Injection will automatically revive your character upon death, or you may choose to revive an ally.

key7.name: Lockpick
key7.description: You sense that this key unlocks a door with a very important person trapped behind it.

key8.name: Decryptor
key8.description: You sense that this key unlocks a door with something critical behind it.

key9.name: Keycard
key9.description: You sense that this key unlocks a door with great evil behind it.

key10.name: JailHint
key10.description: You notice a report on a tablet, quickly skimming it you read: 'The loss of the jail block master key is unacceptable... The station commander's prisoner Lia is a highly valuable asset... Key must be retrieved at once... Reports indicate the loss occured within the Hallway near the Security Room.

key11.name: Datadrive
key11.description: A DataDrive. Looks like it contains someone's valuable information.

key12.name: Beamsaber
key12.description: Must be the weapon of some late Jaydai, legends say they used these to deflect enemy fire.

coin.name: Coin
coin.description: A gold coin adorned with intricate engravings, featuring the partially discernible inscription 'Khajiit'.
coin.use_error: It does nothing, maybe you could give this to someone?
